description: Piccolo Daimaou is the evil counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch11412 [Kami-sama]. He was sealed in an electric rice cooker by Mutaito to stop his reign of terror on Earth. He was released centuries later and started terrorizing the Earth yet again. http://anidb.net/ch2116 [Gokuu] ends up killing him to stop him. Before dying he transferred his essence into an egg which later hatches into http://anidb.net/ch11416 [Piccolo Jr].
name: Piccolo Daimaou
